SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.Observers

Class GameObserver

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.Observers.GameObserver
public class GameObserver extends Object
Observer responsible for handling game updates and notifying the server.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • GameObserver

      public GameObserver(ObServerManager o, Game game, NetworkManager networkManager)
      Constructs a GameObserver with the Observer Manager, game instance, and network manager.
      Parameters:
      o - The Observer Manager instance to handle message notifications.
      game - The Game instance being observed.
      networkManager - The Network Manager instance for managing network interactions.

  • Method Details

    • updatedDeck

      public void updatedDeck(String nickname, Card topCard, int whichDeck)
      Notifies the server with an updated deck message based on the top card of a specified deck.
      Parameters:
      topCard - The top Card of the deck.
      whichDeck - Specifies which deck is updated (0 for resource deck, 1 for gold deck).

    • updatedPublicCards

      public void updatedPublicCards(String nickname, int whichDeck)
      Notifies all clients about a player drawing from the public cards. Updates include new public cards and the top card's resource type.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player who drew from the public cards.
      whichDeck - Specifies which deck is updated (3 for public cards).

    • updatedPublicGoals

      public void updatedPublicGoals(GoalCard[] publicGoals)
      Notifies clients about updated public goals.
      Parameters:
      publicGoals - The array of GoalCards representing the updated public goals.

    • updatedCurrentPlayer

      public void updatedCurrentPlayer(String currentPlayerNick)
      Notifies clients about the updated current player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerNick - The nickname of the current player.

    • updatedGameState

      public void updatedGameState(GameState gameState)
      Notifies clients about the updated game state.
      Parameters:
      gameState - The updated GameState.

    • updatedAck

      public void updatedAck(boolean ack, double receiverID)
      Notifies clients about an updated acknowledgement.
      Parameters:
      ack - The acknowledgement status.
      receiverID - The ID of the receiver.

    • updatedError

      public void updatedError(double receiverID, String errorMessage)
      Notifies clients about an updated error message.
      Parameters:
      receiverID - The ID of the receiver.
      errorMessage - The error message content.

    • unRegisterClient

      public void unRegisterClient(String message, double receiverID) throws IOException
      Unregisters a client from the server and notifies all clients about the unregistration.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be sent to clients.
      receiverID - The ID of the receiver.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an IO error occurs during unregistration process.

    • gameIsEnding

      public void gameIsEnding()
      Notifies clients that the game is ending. Checks if both decks and public cards are empty or if a player reached 20 points.

    • lastPlayerStanding

      public void lastPlayerStanding(String winnerNickname)
      Notifies client that he is the last player standing in the game.

    • removedPlayer

      public void removedPlayer(String nickname)
      Notifies clients that a player has been removed from the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the removed player.

    • updatedWinners

      public void updatedWinners(List<String> winnersNickname)
      Notifies clients about updated winners of the game.
      Parameters:
      winnersNickname - The list of nicknames of the winners.

    • winnerDueToForfeit

      public void winnerDueToForfeit(String winnerNickname)
      Notifies clients that a player won due to opponent's forfeit.
      Parameters:
      winnerNickname - The nickname of the winner due to forfeit.

    • notifyServer

      public void notifyServer(ModelMessage msg)
      Notifies the server by adding a ModelMessage to the server's message queue.
      Parameters:
      msg - The ModelMessage to be added to the server's message queue.
